title: Barbell Hip Thrusts
description: Standing Single / One Leg Circles Floor / Power Jumps / Knee to Jump Squats Browse all exercises Barbell hip thrusts is a gym work out exercise that targets glutes & hip flexors and also involves abs. Refer to the illustration diagram and instructions above for how to perform this exercise correctly. Standing single / one leg circles, floor / power jumps / knee to jump squats and surrenders are related exercise that target the same muscle groups as barbell hip thrusts. Visit our free illustrated exercise directory for more exercises to try in your workouts.
